name: CAPM
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: cap m.
des:
This volume of the Value Tutor series reviews your knowledge of the Capital Asset Pricing Model's (CAPM) key assumptions. The Capital Asset Pricing Model, along with many of it's underlying assumptions, has been a part of vast expanses of wealth creation, analytics and valuation for the past 50 years. Every valuation professionals needs to know the key CAPM assumptions. This skill is one way to help that process along.

Topics covered in other Value Tutor volumes include:

Duff & Phelps versus Stocks, Bills, Bonds and Inflation (SBBI also referred to as Ibbotson)

Capitalization of Earnings Method

Discounted Cash Flow Method of Valuation

Adjusted Net Asset Method of Valuation

Excess Earnings Method of Valuation

Guideline Publicly Traded Company Valuation Method

Completed Transaction (also known as the Guideline Transaction) Valuation Method

Discounts for Lack of Marketability (DLOMs)

Discounts for Lack of Control (DLOC)

Option Pricing Method

Estate Valuations

Gift Valuations

FLIPS (Family Limited Partnerships) Valuations

Topic 820 (Accounting Fair Value) Valuations

Earn-out Valuations

Valuing Contingent Consideration

M&A Valuations

Intangible Valuations
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
